pullRequest.title: Add WebView support to iOS and Android

commit.message: Add js resource files and use WebKit

nodes.bodyText: Any specific reason why these are public? I don't see their usage outside this class.
This is dangerous. It's better to fit the lib between whole-archive/no-whole-archive options, so that it keeps working in case there is more than 1 occurrence of whole-archive
